content: अवलोकनं {@--1@} Looking at, beholding, seeing; नो बभूवुरवलोकनक्षमाः <ls>R. 11. 60.</ls> {@--2@} Looking over, commanding a view of; दीर्घिकावलोकनगवाक्षगता <ls>M. 1.</ls> {@--3@} Sight, eye. {@--4@} A look, glance; योगनिद्रांतविशदैः पावनैरवलोकनैः <ls>R. 10. 14.</ls> {@--5@} Looking out for, inquiry, seeking.
